ActJudges Act
SubjectIrene A. Hall ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. Donald M. Hall **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to IRENE A. HALL, survivor of the Hon. Donald M. Hall, a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia, effective July 17, 2015.
